thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com
thread.title: Zen Zone
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Zen Zone

author: Zen Zone
title: Zen Zone
text:
Bundle offers are unbeatable, only caveat is sometimes you get the same games in newer bundles but this ratio is small; only 1 or 2 in a bundle of 10 or more games. Other times you get completely new bundles with no redundant games. Look out for Star Deals and Pick & Mix bundles, they are your best bet in getting the best deals and games you don't already have.
I've never had a problem with invalid or duplicate keys and they are received promptly. Extremely rare are purchases delayed pending approval of manual review.
